automation_yaml:
id: 'time_based_office_living_room_lighting'
alias: Time-based Office WLED and Living Room
description: "Time-based office and living room routine centered around Office WLED with cleanup of unused lights"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: event
    event_type: my_custom_time_lighting_trigger
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "09:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 200
                - 150
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id:
                - light.living_room_2
                - light.hue_office_back_left
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
                - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "17:00:00"
            before: "20:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness_pct: 80
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id:
                - light.hue_office_back_left
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
                - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "21:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 160
                - 100
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id:
                - light.living_room_2
                - light.hue_office_back_left
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
                - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
